chapter.title: DML (Data Manipulation Language)
chapter.screen: SELECT - retrieve data from the a database INSERT - insert data into a table UPDATE - updates existing data within a table DELETE - deletes all records from a table, the space for the records remain CALL - call a PL/SQL or Java subprogram EXPLAIN PLAN - explain access path to data LOCK TABLE - control concurrency

section.title: INSERT INTO ... SELECT
INSERT IGNORE
section.para: INSERT IGNORE 与INSERT INTO的区别就是INSERT IGNORE会忽略数据库中已经存在 的数据，如果数据库没有数据，就插入新的数据，如果有数据的话就跳过这条数据。
